nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN  MEXICO...
summary:
...HEAVY RAINFALL AND FLOODING CONTINUES OVER PORTIONS OF EASTERN  MEXICO...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Mon Jul 1
 the center of Chris was located near 20.2, -97.7
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
